resources.string: Number of overs per side (50 overs or less)
Did Team 1 bat their full amount of overs?
Have you already calculated Team 1\'s revised total?
How many interruptions were in Team 2\'s inning? (Max. 3)
How many interruptions were in Team 1\'s inning? (Max. 3)
Which over was the play interrupted?
Overs remaining at the end of interruption
How many overs available to Team 2 at the start of their inning

When looking for par score for team 2, the user must insert the Number of overs (both teams agreed to play at the start of the match). Did the team 1 bat their full amount of overs? Yes. Insert the Team 1 total, wickets and click next. Insert the number of interruptions that occurred for Team 2. If it is 1, insert the over (eg: over 25.2) that was interrupted, the total and wickets at the interruption. Finally, insert the number of overs Team 2 will be getting after the interruption and click calculate. If 2nd and 3rd interruptions occur after awhile, Please change the number of interruptions to accordingly and fill in the information.
Par Score for Team 2 After Team 1 Completed the Whole Number of Overs
